derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from modern Latin paederastia, from Greek paiderastia, from pais, paid- 'boy' + erastēs 'lover'

means.word_mean: 1. sexual relations between a man and a boy (usually anal intercourse with the boy as a passive partner)

auth_sentence.content: One of the first things the Taliban did a popular move was to punish mujahideen commanders who were accused of rape or pederasty.
